EmailTemplate.name: Warranty - OEM/Spare/ Shop Warranty Verification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Based on the applicable warranty terms, this equipment is:
[ ] Within the OEM / Spare / Repair Warranty Period [ ] Outside the OEM / Spare / Repair Warranty Period
Final Warranty decision will be determined after analytical review of the part by site technician.
Warranty terms were updated in SAP, on Tcode IQ03/Extended Data tab/Customer Warranty/Master Warranty Legend.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
